node.text:
With the weekend coming up, have you zeroed in yet on a tranquil spot away from the hustle and bustle? The Raviz Kovalam has all the right ingredients to revitalize and allow you to spend some quality time with your friends, family or colleagues. Plan the perfect day out here!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
